Question: When the family moved to Pavia, this person stayed in Munich to finish his studies at the Luitpold Gymnasium.
Hints: In 1935, this person returned to the question of quantum mechanics.
This person was affiliated with the Institute for Advanced Study in Princeton, New Jersey, until his death in 1955.
He told his inquirers "Pardon me, sorry! Always I am mistaken for Professor ****.".
